means: 异国情调，异国风味，对外国事物的兴趣

sentence.Network_en: Exoticism in music, painting, and literature evokes the picturesque atmosphere and color of far - off lands.
sentence.Network_cn: 在音乐 、 绘画和文学中的异国情调显现出遥远国度里别致的气氛与色彩.

sentence.Network_en: He spoke of this as a regrettable lapse into political exoticism on his part.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把这件发生在身上的事作为一桩不幸的落入政治上的异国情调的失足来谈论.

sentence.Network_en: This series apparel shows off the elegance and exoticism.
sentence.Network_cn: 此系列服装整体感觉复古典雅,尽显异域风味.

list.abs: with the individual music style , the work combined exoticism with creation method of polytonality .作品采用多调性创作手法与异国情调相结合，具有独特的音乐风格。
He loved the exoticism of Egypt ., 他喜爱埃及的异国情调.

entry.def: Exoticism is the quality of seeming unusual or interesting, usually because of associations with a distant country.
